item.title: MIT 6.830 Lab6 Rollback & Recovery
item.author: 作者
item.description: Lab 6 Rollback & Recovery Outline In this lab you will implement log-based rollback for aborts and log-based crash recovery. We supply you with the code that defines the log format and appends records to a log file at appropriate times during transactions. You will implement rollback and recovery using the contents of the log file. 本实验中你将实现基于日志的中止回滚机制和基于日志的奔溃恢复机制. 我们提供了定义日志格式的代码, 并在事务过程中的恰当时机追加记录到日志文件中. 你将使用日志文件的内容来实现回滚和恢复. The logging code we provide generates records intended for physical whole-page undo and redo.

item.title: MIT 6.830 Lab5 B+Tree Index
item.author: 作者
item.description: Lab5 B+Tree Index Outline | 大纲 In this lab you will implement a B+ tree index for efficient lookups and range scans. We supply you with all of the low-level code you will need to implement the tree structure. You will implement searching, splitting pages, redistributing tuples between pages, and merging pages. 实现一个基于B+树的索引结构, 以支持高效的查找和范围扫描. 具体实现搜索、页面拆分、在页面之间重新分配元祖、合并页面这些操作. As described by the textbook and discussed in class, the internal nodes in B+ trees contain multiple entries, each consisting of a key value and a left and a right child pointer.

item.title: MIT 6.830 Lab3 Query Optimization
item.author: 作者
item.description: Lab3 Query Optimization Outlines Main Task： a selectivity estimation framework.(选择度估计框架) a cost-based optimizer.(基于代价的优化器) Hints： Implement the methods in the TableStats class that allow it to estimate selectivities of filters and cost of scans, using histograms (skeleton provided for the IntHistogram class) or some other form of statistics of your devising. Implement the methods in the JoinOptimizer class that allow it to estimate the cost and selectivities of joins.

item.title: MIT 6.830 Lab2 simpleDB Operators
item.author: 作者
item.description: Lab 2 SimpleDB Operators Outlines 实现操作符 Filter, Join 已提供 Project, OrderBy 的实现供参考 实现 IntegerAggregator, StringAggregator 实现操作符 Aggregate 实现 BufferPool 中与元祖插入、删除和页面驱逐相关的方法（暂不考虑事务） 实现操作符 Insert, Delete 导致页面变脏，调用 BufferPool 的相关方法进行处理 Exercise 1: Filter and Join Filter: This operator only returns tuples that satisfy a Predicate that is specified as part of its constructor. Hence, it filters out any tuples that do not match the predicate.

item.title: MIT 6.830 Lab1 simpleDB
item.author: 作者
item.description: Lab 1 SimpleDB Outlines 实现 Tuple, TupleDesc → 管理元祖 实现 Catalog → 管理表（表对应于文件） 实现 BufferPool → 先从缓冲池获取缓存页面，再从磁盘读取页面加载到缓冲池 实现 RecordId, HeapPageId, HeapPage → 采用堆文件组织方式，堆文件中的单个页面（堆页面） 实现 HeapFile → 堆文件，负责从磁盘读取页面 实现 SeqScan → 顺序扫描的运算符，主要是实现里面返回单个堆文件中所有元祖的迭代器 SimpleDB 表示 字段（Field）、元祖（Tuple）和元祖类型（TupleDesc） 的类 将 谓语和条件应用于元祖 的类 一种或多种访问方法，即将关系存储在磁盘上并且提供关系元祖的迭代方法 处理元祖的运算符集合（包括 select, join, insert, delete） 缓冲池（用于缓存活跃的元祖和页面，并且处理并发控制和事务） 目录 Exercise 1 Tuples in SimpleDB are quite basic. They consist of a collection of Field objects, one per field in the Tuple.
